name: PhD ETH Zuerich
snippet: PhD in Sustainable Architecture. Integration of thin film photovoltaic panels to the existing building stock.
mainText: The thesis focuses on the use of thin film photovoltaic technologies as adaptive building envelopes

name: Adaptive Solar Facade
snippet: The Adaptive Solar Facade is a modular, dynamic building facade consisting of thin film movable solar panels.
mainText: The thesis focuses on the use of thin film photovoltaic technologies as adaptive building envelopes

name: HiLo Building
snippet: HiLo is an innovative building in the domains of lightweight concrete construction and smart, adaptive building systems, planned as a duplex penthouse guest apartment
mainText: The thesis focuses on the use of thin film photovoltaic technologies as adaptive building envelopes

name: PJDobbie Engineering
snippet: I own and run an engineering consultancy, which provides technical expertise to start-up companies and SMEs
mainText: I own and run an engineering consultancy, which provides technical expertise to start-up companies and SMEs. Projects included, electric bike prototyping, wind site analysis, surgical tool prototyping, laptop locking design, geothermal pipe design and design of an avalanche testing drill.

name: Action From Switzerland
snippet: Action from Switzerland provides humanitarian aid to vulnerable female refugees on the Greek Island of Chios
mainText: Action from Switzerland ensures that vulnerable refugees are able to enjoy their rights on an equal basis, in safety and dignity through effective and coordinated aid

name: Climate-KIC Alumni Association
snippet: 2014 Chairman of the Climate-KIC Alumni Association, a network of climate related start-up companies and inovators accross Europe

name: Wound Healing Patch
snippet: Master Thesis: Design and manufacture of new plaster technology that heals large burns and wounds faster than traditional methods.
